name: Trick or Treat Simulator 2K20
description:
For people who are too old, unable, or unwilling to go trick or treating, here's a simulation of it. 

Featuring: 19 different candies, tricks, and treats.

Play using the mouse. Click on stuff.

Follow Aquma on Twitter (@Aquma). Special thanks to my students who lent their voices for the "trick or treat" recording.
